org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryStringQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use QueryStringQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.query  

    • Uses of QueryStringQueryBuilder in org.elasticsearch.index.query

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.index.query that return QueryStringQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.allowLeadingWildcard(boolean allowLeadingWildcard)
      Should leading wildcards be allowed or not.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.analyzer(String analyzer)
      The optional analyzer used to analyze the query string.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.analyzeWildcard(boolean analyzeWildcard)
      Set to true to enable analysis on wildcard and prefix queries.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.autoGeneratePhraseQueries(boolean autoGeneratePhraseQueries)
      Set to true if phrase queries will be automatically generated when the analyzer returns more than one term from whitespace delimited text.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.boost(float boost)
      Sets the boost for this query.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.defaultField(String defaultField)
      The default field to run against when no prefix field is specified.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.defaultOperator(QueryStringQueryBuilder.Operator defaultOperator)
      Sets the boolean operator of the query parser used to parse the query string.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.enablePositionIncrements(boolean enablePositionIncrements)
      Set to true to enable position increments in result query.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.escape(boolean escape)
      Set to true to enable escaping of the query string
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.field(String field)
      Adds a field to run the query string against.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.field(String field, float boost)
      Adds a field to run the query string against with a specific boost.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.fuzziness(Fuzziness fuzziness)
      Set the edit distance for fuzzy queries.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.fuzzyMaxExpansions(int fuzzyMaxExpansions) 
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.fuzzyPrefixLength(int fuzzyPrefixLength)
      Set the minimum prefix length for fuzzy queries.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.fuzzyRewrite(String fuzzyRewrite) 
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.lenient(Boolean lenient)
      Sets the query string parser to be lenient when parsing field values, defaults to the index setting and if not set, defaults to false.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.locale(Locale locale) 
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.lowercaseExpandedTerms(boolean lowercaseExpandedTerms)
      Whether terms of wildcard, prefix, fuzzy and range queries are to be automatically lower-cased or not.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.maxDeterminizedStates(int maxDeterminizedStates)
      Protects against too-difficult regular expression queries.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.minimumShouldMatch(String minimumShouldMatch) 
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.phraseSlop(int phraseSlop)
      Sets the default slop for phrases.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.queryName(String queryName)
      Sets the query name for the filter that can be used when searching for matched_filters per hit.
      static QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.queryStringQuery(String queryString)
      A query that parses a query string and runs it.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.quoteAnalyzer(String analyzer)
      The optional analyzer used to analyze the query string for phrase searches.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.quoteFieldSuffix(String quoteFieldSuffix)
      An optional field name suffix to automatically try and add to the field searched when using quoted text.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.rewrite(String rewrite) 
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.tieBreaker(float tieBreaker)
      When more than one field is used with the query string, and combined queries are using dis max, control the tie breaker for it.
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.timeZone(String timeZone)
      In case of date field, we can adjust the from/to fields using a timezone
      QueryStringQueryBuilder QueryStringQueryBuilder.useDisMax(boolean useDisMax)
      When more than one field is used with the query string, should queries be combined using dis max, or boolean query.
